title: TaskCluster builds intermittently failing while cloning mozilla-central
body:
Here's [an example](https://tools.taskcluster.net/task-group-inspector/#/SO1tViRoRNC6Nd3Ljl-8bQ/WgIIY0UeSt-TSJHwNZRDIw?_k=uvv1jr) (with progress bars removed):
